features: 【Professional Sound Quality】Kimwood Acoustics Laboratory focuses on precise acoustic tuning. It accurately analyzes every detail so that these earphones wired achieves the perfect balance of solid bass, soft midrange, and clear treble. You will feel like you are at a concert as the immersive sound.

【Comfortable Ergonomic Design】The design of these in ear earbuds wired is based on our research on big data in the ear canal, which can fit the natural curves of your ear for optimal comfort and stability and no fatigue over long periods of use. It will bring you the top wearing and listening experience, you can enjoy your music when running, cycling, walking out, or fitness in the gym.

【Excellent Compatibility】The wired earpods adapt the automatically upgraded 3.5mm internationally certified plug, compatible with all audio devices with 3.5mm headphone jack. Perfect design for iPhone, iPad, iPod, Android smartphones, tablets, computers, Laptop, MP3/MP4/PS4, etc.

【HD Call Control】The wired headphones built-in HD microphone, and internal sound-absorbing holes reduce external noise, ensuring call quality and stable transmission. In addition, the controller is conveniently located, allowing you to effortlessly control volume, track songs, play music, take calls and wake up Siri.

【What You Get】1*Earphones with microphone, 1* Stylish storage bag. The 3.9-foot long wired earbuds cable is made of soft and flexible TPU material, durability undergoes rigorous quality testing to ensure more wear and corrosion-resistant. For those looking for high-quality earbuds at a reasonable cost, we believe Kimwood is a good choice. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
body.description: The Vinyl Record Player in Your Pocket High Fidelity Stereo Sound: Kimwood ear buds wired are powered by powerful 15mm speaker driver unit and semi-in-ear acoustic structure, which can pump out the deepest bass, ultra-clear midrange and soaring highs. Immersive sound effects, renewed listening pleasure. High-Quality Materials: 3.5mm gold-plated plug, 100% copper core, flexible and elastic TPU headphone cable. The perfect fit between lossless sound transmission and extreme durability.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Vinyl Record Player in Your Pocket High Fidelity Stereo Sound: Kimwood ear buds wired are powered by powerful 15mm speaker driver unit and semi-in-ear acoustic structure, which can pump out the deepest bass, ultra-clear midrange and soaring highs. Immersive sound effects, renewed listening pleasure. High-Quality Materials: 3.5mm gold-plated plug, 100% copper core, flexible and elastic TPU headphone cable. The perfect fit between lossless sound transmission and extreme durability. High Quality Audio Stylish and simple appearance 15mm oversized caliber dynamic drive 3.5mm gold-plated plug, 100% copper core TPU material, highly durable Not easy to break even if pulled

We not only pay attention to sound quality but also the comfort of wearing is our most important thing. Comfortable Ergonomic Design: The design of our earphones is based on in-depth research on the ear canal, which can fit the natural curve of your ears for optimal comfort and anti-slip effects.Dampening of Ambient Noise: Specially designed earbuds reduce the surrounding noises while minimizing the sound leakage, helps you immerse in your music.Ultra-lightweight: The weight of the ear phones with mic is only 11g, and you’ll barely feel the buds weighing you down. Listening to music for a long time without pressure points or other discomfort.Occasion: Whether you are in the gym, exercising, running or jogging, the earbuds with mic can ensure safer and more comfortable fit to your ears.

Ideal for video calls, remote meetings, remote courses and online games. Built-in remote with inline microphone that allows you to easily adjust volume, pause/play, answer/end calls, or activate Siri.3.5mm plug, compatible with all devices with 3.5mm interface such as iPhone, iPad, iPod, Android smartphones, tablets, computers, Laptop, MP3/MP4/PS4, etc. It is wired earbuds, the audio quality is better without any delay. Plug and play, no need to connect to Bluetooth.You can enjoy games and videos without worrying about delays.

NOTE (1) The device without a 3.5mm headphone jack needs a 3.5mm conversion adapter. If there is a problem with the conversion adapter, the volume button will not work, please check before use. (Some adapters support the controller, and some do not. This is determined by the compatibility of the adapter.) (2) Since the volume button of the wired earbuds is not compatible with computers, laptops, MacBook models, iPod, iPad, Switch, the volume needs to be adjusted on the PC side and other main units.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Sound Quality and Comfortable Fit!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Kimwood Wired Earbuds with Microphone, and I must say I am thoroughly impressed with the performance and comfort they offer.First and foremost, the audio quality is outstanding. The HiFi stereo delivers a rich and immersive listening experience, and the powerful bass adds a depth to the sound that I haven't experienced with other earphones in this price range. Whether I'm listening to music, watching videos, or taking calls, the crystal-clear audio ensures that every detail is crisp and vibrant.The in-ear design provides excellent noise isolation, allowing me to enjoy my music without any disturbances from the surrounding environment. The earbuds fit securely and comfortably, making them ideal for extended use without causing any discomfort. I also appreciate the included different-sized ear tips, ensuring a personalized fit for every user.The built-in microphone is a great addition, and it delivers clear voice quality during calls. I've used these earbuds with my iPhone, iPad, Android device, and computer, and they have proven to be universally compatible, thanks to the 3.5mm jack.The sleek black design adds a touch of sophistication, and the build quality feels sturdy and durable. The tangle-free cable is a practical feature that adds to the overall convenience of these earbuds.In conclusion, the Kimwood Wired Earbuds with Microphone offer exceptional value for the price. If you're in search of reliable, high-quality wired earphones with a microphone, look no further. I highly recommend these earbuds to anyone in need of a versatile and affordable audio solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These earbuds are really great! The sound quality is awesome as well as the quality of the product itself. They worked perfectly with my adapter for my iPhone 7 and with my iPad (gen 2). The sound quality for calls is crisp and love that I can control the volume while on a call, listening to music or streaming movies. They also fit very comfortably, came packaged good and the delivery was fast. The small bag included was appreciated as it will keep them protected when storing. I highly recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These earbuds are durable and effecient for the price
reviews.reviewText: After using these earbuds for months(since I bought them multiple times), I can say that these earbuds are great. The mic quality is great and sounds quite clear but it will pick up background noise very easily when playing video games. This can easily be fixed with noise suppression if you're using it on other things such as Discord. The earbuds also last a very long time which I was surprised to find out. It can last you about 6-7 months until the sound from one of the earbuds starts to sound lower. But, overall, I'd say these are a solid pair of earbuds that I recommend to anyone who needs one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 Stars for Multiple Reasons!
reviews.reviewText: My son suggested I try this brand of wired earbuds because I have so much trouble keeping earbuds in my ears. He was right!In the past, when I put earbuds in my ears, I try to make the full little circular speaker face toward my ear so I can get the full benefit of everything from the treble through to the base. It just doesn't work for me. My ear is too small, and they always pop out. And the ones that have a large end to place in your ear with a small speaker sticking out of it that goes into your ear canal still fall out of my ear because I don't have enough "ear surface" to keep those from falling out of my ear and they never give me a rubber tip small enough to fit into my ear.I hope I can explain this: These aren't exactly round; they have a small protrusion on one end. The end of that protrusion is flat and THAT is where the speaker is located. You place the bud sideways into your ear; sort of like sliding it in with the speaker pointed toward your eardrum. The bud lays flat against your ear and stays there because the disc part of the bud is held in place by your ear on both sides of the bud as it slides toward your ear canal. All the sound goes directly toward your eardrum through the flat edge buried in your ear. The sound is so amazing. The big surprise is you don't have to have the volume turned up so loud to hear all the music. I had to turn it down from the setting I use for my other ear buds! And I was able to enjoy really good, clear, amazing music. Although I still hear sound around me like if the A/C turns off or on, or someone says something - but it does not bother the music one little bit. To be honest, it was sort of like the ultimate club or bar experience; you get to hear all the great music and can enjoy it with friends without having to shout at each other to share it and your thoughts. Or going to one of those movie clubs with tables and being able to hear the film perfectly and talk about it with your companions at the same time.The quality is not just fantastic for music. Works great for everything I have tried so far like phone, movies, tablet, games. And I mean a lot of different games; Terraria, Minecraft, or COC with my grandson, as well as WOW, Diablo and everything in between. We are definitely a gaming family!I have noticed that all the controls work so far on phone, tablet, and such, but I did discover the volume control does not work on PC. But I am so happy with the quality of sound I don't mind that at all. It is handy to control volume on the phone or tablet using the earbud control because you have to adjust controls on those things with little buttons on the sides; sometimes having to pick the device up to do so while you are trying to use it. Having it on the earbud wire is better. I have volume and other controls readily handy on my PC as well as on my keyboard and don't even think about adjusting it on the wired earbuds, anyway.2 thumbs up, 5 Stars, and THANK YOU. I love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Best bet for your money!"
reviews.reviewText: These Kimwood wired earbuds with a microphone are of a great quality, and produce sound like earbuds costing a hundred dollars. The Hifi stereo sound is amazing,for what you pay for these. I have bought them four times,I give two as gifts, keeping two for my use. So go ahead and buy some for your use,plus to give as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Awesome sound. Great shape. Working perfect. And the service are sooo good. Because I bought 2 pairs and one of those not working good. I call to the costume service and they replaced for another ones!!!. Good service good sound. !! Nothing else matters....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The sound works but the volume buttons do not.
reviews.reviewText: I needed new chorded earbuds on very short notice after my old ones stopped working and these were the only ones I could find at the time that could be delivered overnight. So that's the pro. Otherwise the sound quality is ok, though they are very loud by default and I have to keep my laptop below level ten to avoid blowing out my eardrums. The volume buttons on the earbuds seemingly do not work as well. And like other people have mentioned the bass is off, but voices are very clear. If you need inexpensive headphones in a pinch these work fine. Otherwise there are even cheaper and better options like the old-school Sony earbuds or even skullcandy etc.
Up to now we're satisfied.Not made with cheap plastic.
Very bad quality the ear phone broke when it dropped to the floor from the table within 24 hours of use
Excellent Ear Phones for My LaptopHighly Recommended
its really hard to find earphones that fit into your ear without physically wedging in your ear. these earphones are great, comfy and fit perfectly.sound quality is a bit sketchy hence the 3 stars.

reviews.reviewTitle: Broke after 2 week use.one side its broke no sound comming.
